MSG.ShortText: Allocation of main memory for data backup failed
MSG.Description: The memory allocation for the storage of page numbers relevant to the next data backup failed. Data backup cannot be completed without this storage space.
The memory allocation of $ALLOC_SIZE$ bytes for the compressed storage space of page numbers failed.

MSG.ShortText: Allocation of main memory for database consistency check failed
MSG.Description: The memory allocation for the storage of page numbers used during the database consistency check failed. Database consistency check cannot be completed without this storage space.

The page with the page number '$PAGENO$' and the persistence type ' $PERSISTENT_TYPE$' that was read during the data backup is not in the value range of the data area. The highest page number currently addressable is '$PAGENO_1$'.

MSG.ShortText: Page is not a part of the current data backup
MSG.Description: The page with the page number '$PAGENO$' and the persistence type ' $PERSISTENT_TYPE$' that was read during the data backup is not part of the current data backup.

MSG.ShortText: Could not assign physical page address
Converter component is in wrong operating state
Configuration mismatch concerning parameter VOLUMENO_BIT_COUNT detected
Configuration mismatch concerning parameter VOLUMENO_BIT_COUNT detected
Could not execute migration, because migration check failed
Converter component is in an incompatible operating state
Could not determine new page number
Could not determine data backup relevant pages
Data backup relevant page could not be marked
